title: Anonymous posting toggle
body: As a student, I want to post anonymously so that I can share honest thoughts without revealing my identity.

title: Post creation form
body: As a poster, I want a simple post form with title, content, and tag selector so that I can share ideas quickly.

title: Tag suggestion rules
body: As a poster, I want tag suggestions based on my text so that I can categorize my post easily.

title: Course & Professor board
body: As a student, I want a board to discuss professors and courses so that I can see reviews and experiences.

title: Campus Life board
body: As a student, I want a space to discuss second-hand items or lost-and-found posts so that I can connect with peers.

title: Trending board
body: As a reader, I want to see the most popular posts so that I can stay updated with trending campus topics.

title: Tag filtering
body: As a reader, I want to filter posts by tag so that I can find relevant discussions faster.

title: Search posts
body: As a reader, I want to search posts by keyword so that I can locate specific topics easily.

title: Upvote system
body: As a reader, I want to like or upvote posts so that the most helpful or interesting ones appear first.

title: Comment feature
body: As a student, I want to comment on posts so that I can join the discussion.

title: Report post
body: As a user, I want to report inappropriate content so that moderators can review and maintain a safe environment.

title: Admin moderation panel
body: As an admin, I want to view and manage reports so that I can remove posts that violate rules.

title: User authentication
body: As a user, I want to sign up or log in so that I can create posts and interact securely.

title: Anonymous display logic
body: As a reader, I want to see anonymous posts labeled as ‘Anonymous’ so that privacy is respected while content is visible.

title: User post history
body: As a logged-in user, I want to see my own posts (non-anonymous ones) so that I can manage or edit them.

title: Post detail view
body: As a reader, I want to click on a post to see its full content, tags, and timestamp so that I can read discussions clearly.

title: Sorting options
body: As a reader, I want to sort posts by recency or upvotes so that I can browse efficiently.

title: Responsive design
body: As a mobile user, I want the forum to display correctly on my phone so that I can browse easily anywhere.

title: Admin delete posts
body: As an admin, I want to delete flagged or offensive posts so that the forum stays healthy.

title: Deployment setup
body: As a developer, I want to deploy the forum on a live server so that users can access it publicly.
